meanings.definition: Each of a series of slender curved bones articulated in pairs to the spine in humans and other vertebrates, protecting the thoracic cavity and its organs.
meanings.sent1: The doctor pointed to the ribs on the X-ray to show where the injury was.
meanings.sent2: She felt pain in her rib after falling off the swing.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy tried to chew on the rib bone-shaped toy.
meanings.sent4: His laughter shook his whole body, making his ribs ache.
meanings.sent5: The ribs of the umbrella provided shelter from the rain.

meanings.definition: A cut of meat containing a rib bone.
meanings.sent1: The chef grilled the rib to perfection, making it juicy and flavorful.
meanings.sent2: They ordered a rack of ribs at the barbecue restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The hungry child eagerly devoured the rib, leaving no trace behind.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the cooking rib filled the kitchen with a mouth-watering scent.
meanings.sent5: The rib was so tender that it fell off the bone effortlessly.

meanings.definition: A raised ridge in a knitted or woven fabric.
meanings.sent1: The sweater had a decorative rib along the cuffs and hem.
meanings.sent2: She noticed a rib in the fabric of her favorite scarf.
meanings.sent3: The rib in the sock added extra stretch and comfort.
meanings.sent4: The rib on the collar of the shirt gave it a stylish touch.
meanings.sent5: The rib pattern on the blanket created a cozy texture.
